ActJudges Act
SubjectThérèse Ayles ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. Lewis C. Ayles
PrecisGranting of an annuity to THÉRÈSE AYLES, widow of the Honourable Lewis C. Ayles, a Judge of the Court of Appeal of New Brunswick, effective October 22, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
